text: - [Narrator] Are you truly able
to extract maximum value from your data?

Because of the exponential
growth and diversity

of data that's generated,
it's difficult to access,

cleanse and transform the
data to make your analytics

and machine learning
initiatives a reality.
Traditional ETL tools require multiple

products to get the job
done, are expensive to scale
and they're not designed for all users.

Now is the time to elevate
your data integration.

AWS Glue is a modern serverless
data integration service

that makes it easier to
discover, prepare, move
and integrate all your data at any scale.
With AWS Glue, all users can efficiently

and cost-effectively build
modern data pipelines

for analytics, application
development and machine learning.
Simplify data integration.

AWS Glue provides a
single service that will
relieve your teams of the heavy lifting.
It automates data discovery,
simplifies access and modernizes cleansing

and transformation while
managing a central data catalog.
AWS Glue is cost-effective.
There's no infrastructure to manage.

AWS Glue provisions,
configures and scales.

You pay only for the resources
your jobs use while running.
Faster data integration.

AWS Glue provides tailored tools
for users of all skill sets

from data scientists and
engineers, to analysts.

Flexible support for
all types of workloads.
Support for simple to complex workflows
and multiple workloads, like ETL, ELT,
and streaming, all without lock-in.

AWS Glue is the bridge to
building a modern data pipeline.
Get started with AWS Glue today
or contact us to learn more.
